EmailTemplate.name: SM-2018-12-2019 IT Predictions EMEA.Email - Invite 1a - EMEA.ES 1 - HTML Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: £5 Amazon Gift Card for 3 Minute Survey | 2019 IT Prediction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://bit.ly/predictions-2019]]> Take Survey and Earn £5 Amazon Gift Card <[[http://bit.ly/predictions-2019]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you wondering what the top initiatives will be for IT organisation's like yours in 2019?
Let's find out together. Take our 3-Minute 2019 Predictions Survey <[[http://bit.ly/predictions-2019]]> to help predict the future on the state of infrastructure optimisation, cloud migration, containers and more.
Take Survey Now <[[http://bit.ly/predictions-2019]]>
As a thank you for your time, you will earn a £5 Amazon Gift Card upon completion of the survey. Furthermore, we are offering a £40 Amazon Gift Card for agreeing to a 30-minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer.
Regards, Megan
